# CS 132 Final Project API Documentation
**Author:** Joy Shi
**Last Updated:** 10/31/22

The Film API provides functionality to retrieve and post data for an online film poster store.

Clients can retrieve information for current items available on the film poster store, such as films, reviews, and images. Functionality is also provided to send "contact us" messages and reviews.

## *Endpoint 1*
**Request Type:**
GET
**Returned Data Format**: Plain Text

**Description:** This request gets a list of image paths of the movie posters. Uses globby to parse through the image directory.

**Supported Parameters** 
N/A
**Example Request:**
'\images'
**Example Response:**

```
["imgs/akira.jpg","imgs/chungking-express.jpg","imgs/eraserhead.jpg","imgs/eyes-wide-shut.jpg","imgs/fallen-angels.jpg","imgs/in-the-mood-for-love.jpg","imgs/lady-bird.jpg","imgs/moonlight.jpg","imgs/mulholland-drive.jpg","imgs/paris-texas.jpg","imgs/pier-kids-the-life.jpg","imgs/the-florida-project.jpg","imgs/three-colors-blue.jpg","imgs/three-colors-red.jpg","imgs/three-colors-white.jpg"]
```


## *Endpoint 2*
**Request Type:**
GET
**Returned Data Format**: Plain Text

**Description:** This request gets the reviews for a certain film 

**Supported Parameters** 
':f/reviews' required
**Example Request:**
':f/reviews'
**Example Response:**

```
{"ratings":["5",""],"reviews":["Super super lovely film!"]}
```

**Error Handling:**
*Summarize any possible errors a client should know about*
*Fill in at least one example of the error handling*

## *Endpoint 3*
**Request Type:**
GET
**Returned Data Format**: JSON

**Description:** This request gets a list of directory names which contain the film names. 

**Supported Parameters** N/A

**Example Request:** *Fill in example request(s)*
'films'
**Example Response:**
*Fill in example response in the ticks*

```
"films" : ["akira","chungking-express","eraserhead","eyes-wide-shut","fallen-angels","in-the-mood-for-love","lady-bird","moonlight","mulholland-drive","my-neighbor-totoro","paris-texas","pier-kids-the-life","the-florida-project","three-colors-blue","three-colors-red","three-colors-white"]
```

**Error Handling:**
*Summarize any possible errors a client should know about*
*Fill in at least one example of the error handling*
When the directory is empty, the error is caught. 


## Endpoint 4*
**Request Format:** GET

**Returned Data Format**: JSON

**Description:** Gets all the information for the film strip

**Supported Parameters** 


**Example Request:** 
'strip'
**Example Response:**

```json

But avoiding human interactions on the bustling streets of Paris proves impossible, and she eventually meets up with Olivier, an old friend who harbors a secret love for her, and who could draw her back to reality.Mitsuo Iwata, Nozomu Sasaki, Mami Koyama","cast":"Juliette Binoche, Benoît Régent, Florence Pernel","price":"19.99","quantity":"10","image":"imgs/three-colors-blue.jpg","citation":"data:image/jpeg;base64,"},{"name":"Three Colors Red","year":"1994","country":"Switzerland","director":"Krzysztof Kieślowski","description":"Part-time model Valentine meets a retired judge who lives in her neighborhood after she runs over his dog. When she returns with the dog to the judge’s house, she discovers him listening in on his neighbors’ phone conversations. Forced to leave France after losing the business they jointly owned, Karol enlists fellow Polish expatriate Mikolah to smuggle him back to their homeland.","cast":"Zbigniew Zamachowski, Julie Delpy","price":"19.99","quantity":"25","image":"imgs/three-colors-white.jpg","citation":"https://assets.mubicdn.net/images/film/413/image-w1280.jpg?1623770998"}]
}
```

## *Endpoint 5*
**Request Format:** POST

**Returned Data Format**: JSON

**Description:** Submits reviews

**Supported Parameters** *List any optional/required parameters*
* POST body parameters:
    * rating - (required) the rating out of 5 that the customer selects for the film
    * review - (required) the text review


**Example Request:** *Fill in example request(s)*
"/:film/addReview"
**Example Response:**

* rating: 5
* review: ""

**Error Handling:**
*Summarize any possible errors a client should know about*
If there is no review or rating attached to the review an error is thrown.

## *Endpoint 6*
**Request Format:** POST

**Returned Data Format**: plain text

**Description:** Submits comments or concerns for the site

**Supported Parameters** *List any optional/required parameters*
* POST body parameters:
    * message - (required) a message longer than 10 characters


**Example Request:** *Fill in example request(s)*
"/msg"
**Example Response:**

* message: ""

**Error Handling:**

If there is no message attached to the review an error is thrown.
